Teva Pharmaceuticals3.6
Internal Channels Manager (Temp- Maternity leave)
Tel Aviv-Yafo
Apply on employer site

Internal Channels Manager (Temp- Maternity leave)

Date: Mar 15, 2023
Location: Tel Aviv, Israel, 1
Company: Teva Pharmaceuticals
Job Id: 46629

Who are we?

Together, we’re on a mission to make good health more affordable and accessible, to help millions around the world enjoy healthier lives. It’s a mission that bonds our people across nearly 60 countries and a rich, diverse variety of nationalities and backgrounds.

Working here means working with the world’s leading manufacturer of generic medicines, and the proud producer of many of the products on the World Health Organization’s Essential Medicines List. Today, at least 200 million people around the world take one of our medicines every single day. An amazing number, but we’re always looking for new ways to continue making a difference, and new people to make a difference with.

Job Description

This is an opportunity to work in a leading global Pharma company and a professional communications team responsible for communication to around 40,000 employees worldwide. This person will take ownership of the internal channels and devise the appropriate internal channels strategy as well as approach to each of the channels, and measure success. They will also manage the planning and editorial for the internal channels and secure the quality of the content. The key elements of the position are:

  • Lead the internal channels strategy, manage the content and be responsible for the calendar for each.
  • Serve as a trusted partner for campaign managers / global communications colleagues for best practice and guidelines for internal communication.
  • Responsible for the editorial plan for the global sections of Teva’s intranet, and works closely with the Digital team as well as markets' communicators
  • Reviews alternative internal / external channels not yet used or not fully utilized in Teva, and if relevant, be responsible for implementation of the strategy / content for that channel (working with the Digital team on the technical implementation).
  • Plan and analyze analytics per channel / communication campaign across channels, and present with learnings and proposed changes to increase effectiveness of reach (working with the Digital team to provide the data)
  • Responsible for the strategy and governance for internal newsletters and mass emails
  • Responsible for editing the global One Teva newsletter

Qualifications

  • A bachelor's degree in communications or a related discipline.
  • English mother-tongue essential, Hebrew an advantage (spoken)
  • Proven experience of at least 5 years in internal communications
  • Able to see the “big picture” and understand the needs of the various departments who need to use the internal channels to communicate.
  • Strong project management and organizational skills.
  • Ability to work in a focused and accountable way under pressure and to tight deadlines.
  • High levels of attention to detail and quality.
  • Strong collaboration skills and the ability to influence others
  • Highly developed verbal and written communication skills in mother-tongue English.
  • Located in Tel Aviv Site, Israel.

Function

Communications

Sub Function

Public Relations / Corporate Reputation

Reports To

VP Brand Marketing

Already Working @TEVA?

If you are a current Teva employee, please apply using the internal career site available on "Employee Central". By doing so, your application will be treated with priority. You will also be able to see opportunities that are open exclusively to Teva employees. Use the following link to search and apply: Internal Career Site

The internal career site is available from your home network as well. If you have trouble accessing your EC account, please contact your local HR/IT partner.

Teva Pharmaceuticals Benefits

4.1
★★★★★
3 Ratings

Employer Summary

We recognize that employees are our greatest asset and take pride in offering a highly competitive, comprehensive and affordable benefits plan.

Highlights of our US benefits package include:

  • Immediate eligibility with most benefits
  • Medical, vision, prescription and dental
  • Flex spending accounts (FSA)
  • 401k plan with a 6% dollar-for-dollar match
  • Annual defined contribution (3.75% for eligible 401(k) earnings)
  • Employee stock purchase plan (ESPP)
  • Paid time off
    • Vacation, holidays and floating holidays
    • Maternity and paternity leave
    • Adoption leave and assistance
    • Military, jury duty and bereavement
  • Business travel accident insurance
  • Basic life and AD&D insurance (with optional extended life insurance)
  • Tuition assistance and individual development
  • Short-term and long-term disability
  • WorkLife/employee assistance program (EAP)
